heading: HR01485
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REPORTED ANOMALIES AND CORRUPTION IN THE ISSUANCE OF OVERSEAS EMPLOYMENT CERTIFICATES (OEC) TO OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS BY THE PHILIPPINE OVERSEAS EMPLOYMENT ADMINISTRATION, AND TO DETERMINE WHETHER THERE ARE MODIFICATIONS TO BE MADE WITH RESPECT TO THE LATTER'S SYSTEMS, PROCESSES OR PROCEDURES
